snippet: With what appeared to be only a slim victory in Ohio, the most coveted primary of Super Tuesday, Mitt Romney must decide what is needed to repair his candidacy.
abstract: News analysis; Mitt Romney, with what appears to be only a slim primary victory in Ohio, must now decide whether steps are necessary to repair his lethargic candidacy; Republican nominating race was always destined to plod on, considering that none of the candidates have reached even half of the 1,144 delegates needed to win, but the campaign is suddenly bracing for new questions about Romney's ability to piece together a coalition needed to move closer to a general election fight with Pres Obama.
lead_paragraph: With what appeared to be only a slim victory in Ohio, the most coveted primary of Super Tuesday, Mitt Romney must decide what is needed to repair his candidacy.

headline.main: With No Knockout Punch, a Bruising Battle Plods On
headline.print_headline: With No Knockout Punch, a Bruising Battle Plods On
headline.sub: Romney Ahead but the Race Grinds On
